Title: 016: Data-Driven Operations, Consulting Approaches, and Mentoring with Richard Hopkins
Description:
In this episode of the Super Data Science Podcast, I chat with Director at PricewaterhouseCoopers Richard Hopkins. You will know how data drives business operations, learn about bottom-up and top-down consulting approaches and get insights about mentoring.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/16
